Welcome, comments on this blog are now opened !

by

Posted on January 1, 2019 at 12:00 PM

To make the blog more interactive I've finally activated the comments.

I had to spend some time as the theme I use (done by Leo Babauta) does not support them. I had to change manually the source code.

I use Disqus system because I like blogs that use it. It offers a good level of functionality : authentication, notifications, threads.

Feel free to leave your comments and your ideas !
